reviewText: There are not that many documentaries out there on Latin America and when you find one you expect a lot more than this. Not only is it poor quality it is also so over priced. For that price I would have expected at least 7 or 8 hours at least not a DVD of less than 1 hour. My advise is. DO NOT BUY THIS DVD you will only be wasteing your money.
Very poor production quality, very slow moving, not worth 1/5 of the price.
